entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 9:00 AM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023
